include_class 'org.springframework.scripting.jruby.PrimitiveAdder'
class RubyPrimitiveAdder < PrimitiveAdder
def addInts(x, y) x + y end
def addShorts(x, y) x + y end
def addLongs(x, y) x + y end
def addFloats(x, y) x + y end
def addDoubles(x, y) x + y end
def resultIsPositive(x, y) (x + y) > 0 end
end
